resources.string: You cannot use the same email and password for multiple Mozy accounts. Please update your sign in information and try again.
"Mozy encountered an authorisation error. Please try again. If you continue to receive an error, please contact Mozy Support."
You can automatically upload your photos and videos to Mozy. Uploading happens in the background, so that you can continue to work. Would you like to enable this feature?
Your new passcode has been saved. Use your passcode to sign in.
Mozy must be upgraded to the latest version.
There is an older version of this file on your device.\n\nDo you want to replace it with the newer Mozy version?
Are you sure you want to delete $FILENAME?
Delete $FILENAME from your SD card? (This will NOT delete it from Mozy.)
Access to Mozy from this device has been revoked.
Do you want to download this file?

Mozy Sync lets you keep the files you work with most often updated and available on each of the computers and devices you use. With your Mozy username and password, you can install Mozy Sync on any computer.
Would you like to use a passcode for more secure access to your files?
You have protected your files with personal key encryption. To view these files, would you like to enter your personal key?
You cannot view or share files from this backup without entering your personal key.
A network error occurred. Please check your connection settings and try again.
For security reasons you must now wait 10 min before making another attempt to sign in.
Please check your username and password and try again
Please enter a valid email address.
Please enter a valid email address.
Invalid passcode. Select Forgotten Passcode to change your passcode.
Your password cannot contain spaces. Please enter your password again
Your passcode and confirm passcode entries do not match. Please enter them again.
Your passcode must be a 4-digit number.

END-USER LICENSE AGREEMENT ("EULA"), MOZY FOR ANDROID
 
This EULA is a legal agreement between you ("You") and Mozy Inc. ("Mozy") and governs your use of the Mozy mobile application (“Software"). You acknowledge and agree that to the extent not in conflict with this EULA, your use of the Mozy online services and website will be subject to the Mozy Terms of Service (http://mozy.com/terms) and Privacy Policy (http://mozy.com/privacy).
 
1. Licence. Subject to the terms of this EULA, Mozy grants You a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable and revocable licence to use the Software on any mobile device owned or controlled by You that can access the Android Market site operated by Google Inc.
 
2. Maintenance & Support. You acknowledge that while Mozy may provide maintenance and support for the Software from time to time, Mozy will have no obligation whatsoever to furnish such services to You and may terminate such services at any time without notice.
 
3. No Warranty. YOU AGREE THAT YOUR USE OF THE SOFTWARE IS AT YOUR SOLE RISK, AND THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED ON AN "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" BASIS. MOZY, ITS SUPPLIERS AND THEIR RESPECTIVE AFFILIATES EXPRESSLY DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NON-INFRINGEMENT.
 
4. Limitation of Liability. BECAUSE SOME JURISDICTIONS DO NOT ALLOW THE EXCLUSION OR LIMITATION OF LIABILITY FOR INCIDENTAL OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES, SOME OF THE EXCLUSIONS OR LIMITATIONS SET FORTH BELOW MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU.
 
YOU SPECIFICALLY AGREE THAT MOZY, ITS SUPPLIERS AND THEIR RESPECTIVE AFFILIATES WILL NOT BE LIABLE TO YOU FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL OR EXEMPLARY DAMAGES , INCLUDING DAMAGES FOR LOSS OF PROFITS, GOODWILL, USE, DATA, COST OF PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES, OR OTHER INTANGIBLE LOSSES (EVEN IF THE PARTY YOU ARE SEEKING DAMAGES AGAINST HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES), RESULTING FROM THE USE OR INABILITY TO USE THE SOFTWARE OR IN ANY WAY RELATING TO THE SOFTWARE.
 
YOU AGREE THAT THE AGGREGATE LIABILITY OF MOZY, ITS SUPPLIERSS AND THEIR RESPECTIVE AFFILIATES FOR ANY AND ALL CLAIMS IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE IS LIMITED TO TWENTY US DOLLARS ($20). YOU SPECIFICALLY AGREE THAT THIS DAMAGES LIMITATION IS A FUNDAMENTAL ELEMENT OF THE BASIS OF THE BARGAIN BETWEEN YOU AND MOZY.
 
5. Intellectual Property Protection. Mozy respects the intellectual property of others and requires that users of the Software do the same. When You use the Software, You may not upload, store, share, display, post, e-mail, transmit or otherwise make available any material that infringes any copyright, patent, trademark, trade secret or other proprietary rights of any person or entity. In appropriate circumstances, Mozy will terminate the accounts of repeat infringers.
 
6. Legal Compliance & Acceptable Use. You represent and warrant that (i) You are not located in a country that is subject to a U.S. Government embargo, or that that has been designated by the U.S. Government as a “terrorist supporting" country; and (ii) You are not listed on any U.S. Government list of prohibited or restricted parties. You specifically agree that You will not use the Software to (i) violate any laws or regulations; (ii) infringe the intellectual property or other rights of third parties; or (iii) transmit any materials that contain viruses or other harmful computer code or files such as Trojan Horses, worms or time bombs.
 
7. Third Party Agreements. You must comply with any applicable third party terms of agreement when using the Software. In particular, You acknowledge that use of the Software may result in increased charges from your wireless carrier and that You are solely responsible for paying such charges 
 
8. General. This EULA and the relationship between You and Mozy will be governed by the laws of the State of Washington, excluding its conflicts of law provisions. You agree to submit to the personal and exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in Seattle, Washington to resolve any dispute or claim arising from this EULA. As to intellectual property rights, You specifically agree that Mozy may file an action in any jurisdiction to protect or enforce its rights. The United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods will not apply to this EULA. You agree that any claim or cause of action related to this EULA or the use of the Software must be filed within one (1) year after the cause of action arose or be forever barred. You may not assign or transfer any of your rights or obligations under this EULA to a third party without the prior written consent of Mozy. Mozy may freely assign this EULA.
 
Last revised: March 2, 2011
Access your files from anywhere at any time with the Mozy Android app.
You must sign out and then sign in again if you have forgotten your passcode. Sign out now?
The certificate for this server is invalid. You might be connecting to a server that is pretending to be \"$URL\", which could put your information at risk.
You are not currently authorised for mobile access. Please contact your MozyPro administrator for assistance.
Check your username and password and try again.
The encryption key could not be retrieved. Please contact your MozyPro administrator.
The encryption key is empty. Please contact your MozyPro administrator.
The encryption key failed to decrypt this file. Please contact your MozyPro administrator.
The encryption key could not be validated. Please contact your MozyPro administrator.
Your Mozy account setup does not appear to have been completed. Please contact Mozy support for assistance.
Your Mozy version is more recent, update local file?
Unable to sign in to Mozy. You must have at least one computer associated with your account.
You have not viewed any files.
No files have been updated in the last 7 days
You must sign in to Mozy Mobile to share to Mozy
There is a newer version of this file on your device.\n\nDo you want to replace it with the older Mozy version?
This file could not be decrypted with your current personal key. Do you want to enter a different personal key?
You will not be able to view your protected files if you delete your personal key. Are you sure that you want to delete your personal key?
This file is protected with personal key encryption. Would you like to enter your personal key so you can view this file?
Your personal key was successfully saved.
You are on a roaming network. Do you want to download this file?
No matching file was found for search \'$SEARCH\'.
Lock Mozy access with a passcode
How much Mozy storage you have available
Are you sure that you want to sign out from Mozy?
Signing out of your Mozy account will clear the queue of files waiting to be uploaded to your online $SYNC folder. Sign out of Mozy?
To manually upload photos or videos, share them to Mozy from the gallery application.
If you are on a 2G network, you may miss voice calls when data is being transferred on the network.
Upload photos as I take them
Upload videos as I take them
Your account is not set up for upload.
The subdomain entered could not be verified. Please check that the information has been entered correctly and try again.
Cancel current upload or all uploads?
$NUMFILES file(s) $TOTALSIZE will be uploaded to your online $SYNC folder.
Could not upload the file. You may have exceeded your $SYNC storage limit.
There may be an internet connectivity problem, or you may have exceeded your $SYNC storage limit.
Upload failed due to intermittent Internet connectivity
You have exceeded your $SYNC storage limit
Could not find the Mozy server
A file/folder with this name already exists. Please try again.
Name includes invalid characters (\ / : * ? " < > |). Please try again.
